result.title: HVAC Revenues Are Contracting. We Compared Three Manufacturers to Find the Winner.
result.text: The HVAC industry is facing a painful reality check. After years of robust growth driven by pandemic-era construction booms and infrastructure spending, commercial heating and cooling manufacturers are watching revenues contract and margins compress. The question for investors: which companies are positioned to weather it and emerge stronger when demand returns. We compared three HVAC... HVAC Revenues Are Contracting. We Compared Three Manufacturers to Find the Winner..

result.title: Comfort Systems vs. Carrier: Which HVAC Stock has Better Potential?
result.text: The United States HVAC (heating, ventilation and air conditioning) market is experiencing strong multi-year growth, driven by rising energy efficiency demands, the adoption of smart technology, construction booms and government funding initiatives. Firms like Comfort Systems USA FIX and Carrier Global Corporation CARR, whose business operations are directly tied to HVAC and related markets, are benefiting from these favorable trends.

result.title: Comfort Systems or Carrier: Which HVAC Stock Is a Buy Now?
result.text: The heating, ventilation, and air conditioning (HVAC) industry sits directly at the center of major industrial investment cycles right now, from the rapid expansion of artificial intelligence data centers to broader sustainability upgrades and energy-efficient infrastructure. Comfort Systems USA FIX and Carrier Global Corp. CARR are two of the most prominent players benefiting from those long-term trends.

result.title: Carrier Global: Why The Stock Isn't Down More After A Bad Quarter
result.text: Carrier Global shares have underperformed in 2025, driven by a sharp decline in North American residential HVAC sales. Carrier cut its 2025 guidance 13% to $2.65, but the share price stability on earnings day suggests the market has priced this in. Despite residential weakness, CARR benefits from strong commercial HVAC, data center cooling, growth in Asia/the Middle East, and transportation refrigeration.

result.text: CARR tops Q3 earnings and revenue estimates despite lower sales, with shares gaining on strong segment performance and buyback plans.

result.title: Carrier Global (CARR) Q3 Earnings and Revenues Beat Estimates

result.title: Carrier Reports Third Quarter 2025 Results
result.text: Net sales down 7%; organic sales down 4% Total GAAP EPS of $0.47 and adjusted EPS of $0.67 Net cash flows from operating activities were $341 million and free cash flow was $224 million Returned $3 billion to shareholders YTD, including $2.4 billion of share repurchases Expecting full-year 2025 sales of ~$22 billion and adjusted EPS of ~$2.65 Board approves $5 billion share repurchase authorization PALM BEACH GARDENS, Fla. , Oct. 28, 2025 /PRNewswire/ -- Carrier Global Corporation (NYSE:CARR), global leader in intelligent climate and energy solutions, today reported financial results for the third quarter of 2025.

result.title: 5 Relatively Secure And Cheap Dividend Stocks, Yields Up To 8% (Oct. 2025)
result.text: This article is part of our monthly series where we highlight five large-cap, relatively safe, dividend-paying companies offering significant discounts to their historical norms. We go over our filtering process to select just five conservative DGI stocks from more than 7,500 companies that are traded on U.S. exchanges, including OTC networks. In addition to the primary list that yields 3.56%, we present two other groups of five DGI stocks each, from moderate to high yields of up to 8%.

result.title: Carrier Honored on Fortune's 2025 Change the World List Changing the World, For the World We Share
result.text: Prestigious list celebrates companies addressing global challenges with measurable, positive impact PALM BEACH GARDENS, Fla. , Sept. 24, 2025 /PRNewswire/ -- During Climate Week NYC, Carrier Global Corporation (NYSE: CARR), global leader in intelligent climate and energy solutions, announced it has been named to Fortune's 2025 Change the World list, which recognizes companies delivering positive impact through business strategies.
